clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of an Oral Supplement,TK3 (Tryptophan and Thiamine) on the Quality of Life and Chemotherapy Tolerance in Cancer Patients With Advanced Disease.
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Placebo Controlled, Phase II Trial, on the Effect of an Oral Supplement,TK3 (Tryptophan and Thiamine) on the Quality of Life and Chemotherapy Tolerance in Cancer Patients With Advanced Disease.

brief_summary.textblock: The product under investigation relates to a pharmaceutical composition containing a pyrimidine nitrogen base, thymine, and the essential amino acid tryptophan. This product seems to have effect on quality of life and enhance adverse affects of chemotherapy in cancer patients.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the impact of TK3 on the quality of life of patients receiving anti-neoplastic chemotherapy. The secondary objectives are to evaluate the influence of TK3 on the side effects caused by anti-neoplastic chemotherapy, tolerance to this treatment and the safety of the use of the TK3 product in cancer patients, accompanying the appearance of non-characteristic effects of the existing cancer type .

primary_outcome.measure: The role of TK3 in the quality of life of patients receiving anti-neoplastic chemotherapy after 3 cicles of chemotherapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: It depends on the chemotherapy schedule: 14 or 21 days
primary_outcome.description: use of quality of life questionaire QLQ-C30

primary_outcome.measure: The role of TK3 in the quality of life of patients receiving anti-neoplastic chemotherapy after 3 cicles of chemotherapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: It depends on the chemotherapy schedule: 14 or 21 days
primary_outcome.description: use of quality of life questionaire FACIT-F

secondary_outcome.measure: The effects of TK3 on tolerance to anti-neoplastic chemotherapy, with emphasis on the most prevalent side effects, especially fatigue related to cancer treatment according to CTCAE scale of adverse events v 4.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: It depends on the chemotherapy schedule: 14 or 21 days
secondary_outcome.description: use of CTCAE scale of adverse events v 4.0 and Edmonton scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Drugs safety according to CTCAE scale of adverse events v 4.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: It depends on the chemotherapy schedule: 14 or 21 days

arm_group.description: This is a oral supplement combination of tryptophan and thiamine called TK3 to be taken three times a day
Placebo orally, to be taken three times a day

intervention.description: Tryptophan and thiamine as on oral supplement
